name: The best one
description:
IF WASD DOES NOT WORK CHANGE YOUR KEYBOARD LAYOUT TO ENGLISH

First person shooter with teleportation and uncommon gravity mode. There is quake-like & bunnyhop. Become the best player in score!

Made for Siberian Game Jam 2020
Team: Snap Games
Use WASD + mouse to move, left mouse button to shoot, right mouse button to throw portal grenade

Objective is to hit all 6 turrets on the level as fast as you can

If you want to take a deserved place in the leaderboard launch the game with your steam logged in
